sqlMap.statement:
SELECT PARTY_ID PARTY_ID,COMPANY_TYPE_CD COMPANY_TYPE_CD,INDUSTRYKEY INDUSTRYKEY,ISSUE_LICENSE_DT ISSUE_LICENSE_DT,BUSINESS_LICENCE BUSINESS_LICENCE,LICENSE_YEAR_CHECK_DT LICENSE_YEAR_CHECK_DT,MAIN_MANAGE_SCOPE MAIN_MANAGE_SCOPE,ENROL_FUND_AMT ENROL_FUND_AMT,ENROL_FUND_CURRENCY_CD ENROL_FUND_CURRENCY_CD,FORG_INVEST_CERT_NUM FORG_INVEST_CERT_NUM,BASE_ACCT_NUM BASE_ACCT_NUM,BASE_BANK_ID BASE_BANK_ID,BASE_BANK_ORG BASE_BANK_ORG,COMPANY_SCOPE COMPANY_SCOPE,HAVING_SYS_FORM HAVING_SYS_FORM,SPEC_INDUS_ALLOW_CERT_ID SPEC_INDUS_ALLOW_CERT_ID,LOAN_CARD_NUM LOAN_CARD_NUM,GROUP_CUST_IND GROUP_CUST_IND FROM T47_CORPORATION
PARTY_ID = #party_id#

INSERT INTO T47_CORPORATION( PARTY_ID,COMPANY_TYPE_CD,INDUSTRYKEY,ISSUE_LICENSE_DT,BUSINESS_LICENCE,LICENSE_YEAR_CHECK_DT,MAIN_MANAGE_SCOPE,ENROL_FUND_AMT,ENROL_FUND_CURRENCY_CD,FORG_INVEST_CERT_NUM,BASE_ACCT_NUM,BASE_BANK_ID,BASE_BANK_ORG,COMPANY_SCOPE,HAVING_SYS_FORM,SPEC_INDUS_ALLOW_CERT_ID,LOAN_CARD_NUM,GROUP_CUST_IND,ORG_CREDIT_NO ,ORG_CREDIT_VT, LEGAL_OBJ,LEGAL_CARD_TYPE, LEGAL_CARD_NO) VALUES( #party_id#,#company_type_cd#,#industrykey#,#issue_license_dt:DATE#,#business_licence#,#license_year_check_dt:DATE#,#main_manage_scope#,$enrol_fund_amt$,#enrol_fund_currency_cd#,#forg_invest_cert_num#,#base_acct_num#,#base_bank_id#,#base_bank_org#,#company_scope#,#having_sys_form#,#spec_indus_allow_cert_id#,#loan_card_num#,#group_cust_ind#,#org_credit_no#,#org_credit_vt:DATE#, #legal_obj#,#legal_card_type#, #legal_card_no# )

SELECT CASE WHEN A.CARD_TYPE='21' THEN A.CARD_NO ELSE '' END AS ORGAN_CODE, B.FLAG, B.NATION_AFFAIR_NO, B.LOCAL_AFFAIR_NO, B.MANAGER_NO, B.MANAGER_NAME, B.OTHER_INFO, B.ENROL_FUND_AMT, B.ENROL_FUND_CURRENCY_CD, B.BASE_ACCT_NUM, B.BASE_BANK_ID, B.BASE_BANK_ORG, B.COMPANY_SCOPE, B.INDUSTRYKEY, B.COMPANY_TYPE_CD, B.MAIN_MANAGE_SCOPE, B.LEGAL_OBJ, B.LEGAL_CARD_TYPE, B.LEGAL_CARD_NO, B.LEGAL_ADDR, B.LEGAL_TEL, B.BUSINESS_LICENCE, B.LICENCE_END_DT, B.LEGAL_CARD_NO_END_DT,B.LOCAL_AFFAIR_END_DT,B.NATION_AFFAIR_END_DT,B.ORGAN_CODE_END_DT, B.REGISTER_ADDR,B.REGISTER_DT,B.SUBJECT_OFFICER,B.SUPERIOR_LEGAL,B.ACUT_PROF,B.STOCK_HOLDER, B.LICENSE_NAME,B.PERMIT_NO,B.DEPOSITER_TY,B.STOCK_HOLDER_CARD_TYPE,B.STOCK_HOLDER_CARD_NO, B.STOCK_HOLDER_CARD_NO_END_DT FROM T47_CORPORATION B ,T47_PARTY A WHERE B.PARTY_ID = #value# AND A.PARTY_ID = B.PARTY_ID

UPDATE T47_CORPORATION SET PARTY_ID=#party_id#
,INDUSTRYKEY=#industrykey#
ENROL_FUND_AMT=$enrol_fund_amt$
,LEGAL_OBJ=#legal_obj# ,LEGAL_CARD_TYPE=#legal_card_type# ,LEGAL_CARD_NO=#legal_card_no#
WHERE PARTY_ID=#party_id#
